Class ADLXDesktopServicesHelper

Namespace
ADLXWrapper
Assembly
ADLXWrapper.dll

Wrapper over IADLXDesktopServices providing managed/native accessors and Eyefinity helpers.

public sealed class ADLXDesktopServicesHelper : IDisposable
Inheritance
object
ADLXDesktopServicesHelper

Constructors

ADLXDesktopServicesHelper(IADLXDesktopServices*, IADLXDisplayServices*, bool, bool, IADLXSystem*)

Creates a desktop services helper from native desktop/display services.

public ADLXDesktopServicesHelper(IADLXDesktopServices* desktopServices, IADLXDisplayServices* displayServices = null, bool addRefDesktopServices = true, bool addRefDisplayServices = true, IADLXSystem* system = null)

Parameters

desktopServices IADLXDesktopServices*

Native desktop services pointer.

displayServices IADLXDisplayServices*

Optional display services pointer used to build display facades.

addRefDesktopServices bool

True to AddRef the desktop services pointer.

addRefDisplayServices bool

True to AddRef the display services pointer.

system IADLXSystem*

Optional system pointer used to reacquire desktop services per call.

Methods

AddDesktopListEventListener(OnDesktopListChanged)

Adds a desktop list change listener.

public DesktopListListenerHandle AddDesktopListEventListener(DesktopListListenerHandle.OnDesktopListChanged callback)

Parameters

callback DesktopListListenerHandle.OnDesktopListChanged

Callback invoked when the desktop list changes.

Returns

DesktopListListenerHandle

Listener handle that must be disposed to unsubscribe.

Exceptions

ADLXException

If registration fails.

ObjectDisposedException

If disposed.

CreateADLXDesktop(IADLXDesktop*, bool)

Wraps a native desktop pointer in a managed facade.

public ADLXDesktop CreateADLXDesktop(IADLXDesktop* pDesktop, bool addRef = true)

Parameters

pDesktop IADLXDesktop*

Native desktop pointer.

addRef bool

True to AddRef the pointer for this facade.

Returns

ADLXDesktop

Managed desktop facade.

Exceptions

ADLXException

If desktop services are unavailable.

ArgumentNullException

If pDesktop is null.

ObjectDisposedException

If disposed.
